hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever sees me in a dream has (really) seen me, for Satan cannot appear in my form.”

chapter.ara-name: باب رُؤْيَةِ النَّبِيِّ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ فِي الْمَنَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Seeing the Prophet (ﷺ) in a Dream
